XmlScreen.name: welcome
XmlScreen.text:
Welcome to CliMOO by Kayateia!

Please get started using one of the commands below, or type 'help' for more information.

XmlScreen.name: help
XmlScreen.text:
To get started with the game, you'll need an account. For now creating new accounts is disabled, so you'll need to speak with an admin about getting one for yourself. Once you have an account type "login", and you'll be logged into the game.

Alternatively you may wander around in "the lobby" here and get information about the game.

XmlScreen.name: about
XmlScreen.text: This is the CliMOO game server, © 2010-2014 Kayateia. Go here for more information about CliMOO.
